name: com.unity.xr.arcore
description:
Provides native Google ARCore integration for use with Unity's multi-platform XR API.
Supports the following features:
-Efficient Background Rendering
-Horizontal Planes
-Depth Data
-Anchors
-Hit Testing
-Occlusion

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed

- Fixed [Issue #1017](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/arfoundation-samples/issues/1017) in the `ARCoreBackgroundAfterOpaques` shader where some variables were not scoped to the vertex shader correctly.
